short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to do a quick live search on Facebook groups before make a post to avoid duplicate posts.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Facebook Groups Live Search - Search on any Facebook group the post before you submit it for avoiding duplicate posts and time saving up
